Package net.royalur

Class GameBuilder.SimpleWithDiceGameBuilder<R extends Roll>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder<R,​GameBuilder.SimpleWithDiceGameBuilder<R>>
      • net.royalur.GameBuilder.SimpleWithDiceGameBuilder<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The type of rolls that the dice produce.
    Enclosing class:
    GameBuilder
    public static class GameBuilder.SimpleWithDiceGameBuilder<R extends Roll>
extends GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder<R,​GameBuilder.SimpleWithDiceGameBuilder<R>>
    A builder for constructing games that follow the simple rules, with dice that produce non-standard types of rolls.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class net.royalur.GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder

        boardShape, darkPlayerName, lightPlayerName, paths, startingPieceCount

    • Constructor Summary

      Instantiates a builder to build games following a simple rule set.

        Instantiates a builder to build games following a simple rule set.
        Parameters:
        boardShape - The shape of the board.
        paths - The paths that each player must take around the board.
        dice - The dice that is used to generate rolls.
        startingPieceCount - The number of pieces that each player starts with.
        lightPlayerName - The name of the light player.
        darkPlayerName - The name of the dark player.

      • buildRules

        @Nonnull
public SimpleRuleSet<SimplePiece,​PlayerState,​R> buildRules()
        Description copied from class: GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder
        Generates a simple rule set to match the settings in this builder. The rules do not contain any player identification information set in this builder.
        Specified by:
        buildRules in class GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder<R extends Roll,​GameBuilder.SimpleWithDiceGameBuilder<R extends Roll>>
